answers.answer: I was supposed to get induced. I would have been going on 39 weeks. From what I was told, the Dr's like to induce women with GD between 38-39 weeks. I ended up having a c-section at 38+4. :)
Why Did u end up having a c section
The cord was wrapped around my lil man. :(
I have gd and my doctor doesn't induce until 40+ weeks
I had gd with my first and my Dr induced me on my due date
I believe they told me I was being induced at my 37 week appointment
Did u have a ultrasound at every weekly appointment
I had gd but didn't induce me till 40 weeks.
I had an ultrasound every week. I also had to have the NST done weekly.
I have to have nst twice a week.  Not sure why.  I have been keeping my sugar in check. I seriously think the conjure up reasons to get people back in the clinic to charge more money.
I have a nst 2 times a week that start at 35 weeks and I get 1 ultrasound a week now too.
Im getting induced at 39 weeks, im 37 now and she's close to 9 pounds
Twice a week? Wow, that's interesting.

question: Has any one had to get induced due to gd. How many weeks were u when they told u.
title: gestational diabetes and being induced
